citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:45 am on
Monday, November 18, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on doors to two buildings at
the facility. The inspector waited approximately 30 minutes before leaving. Failure to provide access to the facility,
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in
enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:45 am on 
Monday, November 18, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on doors to two buildings at 
the facility. The inspector waited approximately 30 minutes before leaving. Failure to provide access to the facility, 
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in 
enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
